version_description: Here's our shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy!
Here’s our shiny new update, bringing more bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy!
We've made some changes to the way you can leave reviews of the app, updated some delivery messaging, and fixed some bugs under the hood. Enjoy!

We are always making improvements to the app and this week, we have made a few more bug fixes for smooth running! Download the latest version to make the most of Moonpig.
Happy Holidays!

Happy New Year! Our resolution this year is to keep making regular improvements to the app ;-) Therefore, this week we've made a few more bug fixes for your app enjoyment. Download the latest version to make the most of Moonpig!

We’ve done away with some niggling bugs to get you back on track to enjoy marking moments with your family, friends (and of course with February just around the corner…LOVERS). For all your iPhone X-ers out there, thanks for your patience. We’re happy to announce the app is now ready for you. Enjoy!
Here’s our shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy!
Here’s yet another shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy in time for that special day of Saint Valentine!

We’re excited to bring you the next shiny new Moonpig update! We’re doing a load of work under the hood as well as improving our tracking tools, so we can better understand how to make the app perfect for you.
Little bug fixes to make your Moonpig experience more enjoyable.
A few tweaks to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.
A few more tweaks and a handful of bug fixes to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.
One more shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements.
Another update to fix a little few issues and keep your Moonpig experience great.
Fresh fixes to make your Moonpig app experience brilliant!
What was that? Oh, yes! We now support voucher codes in the Moonpig app.

Version 7.0 has landed. We have BIG changes to our checkout that you’ll be over the moon for! We have a brand new basket - now, you can order everything you want to make their day brilliant in one go!
Woohoo! Now it's easier than ever to make someone's day brilliant with the addition of Apple Pay on the Moonpig app. And, we've also made a few bug fixes...
A few more tweaks and a handful of bug fixes to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.

Another update to fix a little few issues and keep your Moonpig experience great.

We’ve been hard at work this week; we added a single column layout to our search pages, making it easier to see all the glorious detail and we fixed a few issues with Ireland Postage, Just in time for Saint Paddy’s. Shoutout to the first person to buy a four-leaf clover card
One more shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements.
A few more tweaks and a handful of bug fixes to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.
A few tweaks to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.
Little bug fixes to make your Moonpig experience more enjoyable.

In this release:
- Improvements to the photo picker in the studio
- Stability improvements meaning less crashes
- We've deleted some unused code so the app is even smaller now!
Here’s our shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy!
Here’s our shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy!

We’ve been busy this release adding new features, making the app easier and squashing bugs
• We now show your upcoming reminders on the home page
• Basket improvements to make it easier to add more than 1 item to your basket
• New Search & Browse Icon to make it easier to find
• Stability improvements
A few more tweaks and a handful of bug fixes to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.
Fresh fixes to make your Moonpig app experience brilliant!
Another update to fix a little few issues and keep your Moonpig experience great.
One more shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements.

Lots of goodies in this update to make the app even more helpful:
• More ways to easily create a reminder for birthdays and anniversaries
• Improvements to the studio to make it easier to personalise cards with lots of photos
• And of course, we've squashed some bugs

Lots of goodies in this update to make the app even more helpful:
• More ways to easily create a reminder for birthdays and anniversaries
• Improvements to the studio to make it easier to personalise cards with lots of photos
• And of course, we've squashed some bugs
A few more tweaks and a handful of bug fixes to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.

Here’s our shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy!
Here’s our shiny new update, bringing more bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy!
A few more tweaks and a handful of bug fixes to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.

You're going to want this update. We've made some improvements to saved cards so you will never lose a masterpiece in progress.
We've also made it easier to find all of the font options so that you can make the insides of cards even more unique. Still no comic sans though.

You're going to want this update. We've made some improvements to saved cards so you will never lose a masterpiece in progress.
We've also made it easier to find all of the font options so that you can make the insides of cards even more unique. Still no comic sans though.

With this next release you can now see your cards in progress on the home page, meaning you can quickly jump back into cards that you’ve started personalising.
We’ve also improved our calendar import feature to make it easier to create Moonpig reminders for any birthdays, anniversaries or special occasions in your calendar.
And you can now see more details on cards before you start personalising them, like the insides and backs of the cards.
Fresh fixes to make your Moonpig app experience brilliant!
Another update to fix a little few issues and keep your Moonpig experience great.
One more shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements.
It’s now easier to find Large and Giant cards in the app. Bigger isn’t always better, but sometimes it really is.

If anyone has been outside recently, they would have noticed that summer is well and truly over, so we decided it’s time to start getting ready for Christmas.
You can now change quantity in the basket, making buying cards for everyone and their dog even easier. We even give you discounts for buying more.
One of the great things about Moonpig is that we store all your addresses so we’ve now made it easier to choose those addresses when sending to multiple locations.
We’ve also made the app work better with iOS 13 for all those people with shiny new iPhones.
A few more tweaks and a handful of bug fixes to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.
A few tweaks to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.
Little bug fixes to make your Moonpig experience more enjoyable.
Here’s our shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy!
Here’s our shiny new update, bringing more bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy!

Great things in this release:
• Showing volume discounts throughout the app. Get all your Christmas cards sorted with up to 60% off!
• Support for personalised mugs, aprons, santa sacks and even personalised alcohol so you can definitely find that personal gift for anyone.

This is a big one. We have been working on a special present for you all. And we want to give it to you early this year.
People are constantly amazed by just how big our Giant Cards actually are and we’ve been trying to find a way to show you without having to get out a tape measure. Enter AR View. Using our new Augmented Reality feature, you can use the Moonpig app to see our cards in the real world.
In AR View, we use your phone’s camera to show you your card and how big it is before you buy it. Give it a try, you won’t believe how big Giant actually is.

Ever had a card in your basket and realised you’ve made a mistake? We’re here to help! With the new “Edit” button, you can fix that typo right from your basket and still get all your Christmas cards sent out on time.
Lots of thanks for your patience while we worked on resolving this issue and to all the teams who spent many long hours building this feature, thank you and Merry Christmas.

Ever had a card in your basket and realised you’ve made a mistake? We’re here to help! With the new “Edit” button, you can fix that typo right from your basket and still get all your Christmas cards sent out on time.
Lots of thanks for your patience while we worked on resolving this issue and to all the teams who spent many long hours building this feature, thank you and Merry Christmas.

You can share links to products straight from the app now, meaning that once you’ve found the perfect card, getting a second opinion is that much easier.
On the product page, you can now see delivery information for that specific product.
As well as showing more information on the product page, we’ve made it a bit clearer to see which addresses certain products can’t be sent to which can be the case for sending gifts abroad.
And finally we’ve made it easier to reset your forgotten password, which it looks like a lot of people used over Christmas. Don’t worry though, the Christmas break has us forgetting our names and how to t y pe too..
A few more tweaks and a handful of bug fixes to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.

Helpful improvements in this release:
• On the product page, we now show you cards and gifts that other people have also viewed to help you find something that’s just right.
• We have also been making updates to the home page and navigation to make it easier to quickly get to the sections that are most relevant, like Valentine’s Day, which at time of writing is not that far away! *Sets a Moonpig Reminder*
• You can now get in contact with our super helpful customer service team through the account section in the app.
• We’ve given the Moonpig Rewards scheme a lick of paint and made it easier to access your voucher codes from within the app, so no more sifting through emails to find it.

In this release:
A few tweaks to make it easier to select the right delivery option to make sure it gets there on time.
We now show personalised gifts that would go great with your card after you’ve finished personalising it. So now it’s even easier to add a picture of their mug to a mug.
And a handful of other improvements under the hood

In this release:
A few tweaks to make it easier to select the right delivery option to make sure it gets there on time.
We now show personalised gifts that would go great with your card after you’ve finished personalising it. So now it’s even easier to add a picture of their mug to a mug.
And a handful of other improvements under the hood
Fresh fixes to make your Moonpig app experience brilliant!
Another update to fix a little few issues and keep your Moonpig experience great.
One more shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements.
A few tweaks to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.

We care a lot about improving the accessibility of our app and know we still have a long way to go but in this release we have improved the product lists so they now read out a description of our cards and their associated information.
We changed a few things under the hood to make deep-linking work better. More on this coming soon.
And we added a new notification to let you know when items in your basket need to be ordered by to get them there the next day.

We care a lot about improving the accessibility of our app and know we still have a long way to go but in this release we have improved the product lists so they now read out a description of our cards and their associated information.
We changed a few things under the hood to make deep-linking work better. More on this coming soon.
And we added a new notification to let you know when items in your basket need to be ordered by to catch today's post.

We now support saving your payment card details!!! A lot of you have mentioned how annoying it is having to enter your card details every time so now you can save your card details securely. This means that next time you come, you can just select a saved card and hit pay. Simples.
We have also been improving how deep-linking works, meaning we will get you to the right place in the app when you open a link online.
As well as a few other small changes that some of you with eagle eyes might spot.
Little bug fixes to make your Moonpig experience more enjoyable.

We've got some great new tools to make it easier for you to find what you're looking for. We have added more filters so when you're shopping for a card, you can choose the occasion, the recipient, the design or theme, the age & even the number of photos. We know it's not easy finding the perfect card to make your own but hopefully this helps.
Here’s our shiny new update, bringing you the latest bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy!
Here’s our shiny new update, bringing more bug fixes and improvements for you to enjoy!
A few more tweaks and a handful of bug fixes to make your Moonpig shopping experience more of a breeze.

In this release we're bringing you even more ways to stay in touch from a distance. You can now buy Postcards, perfect for letting someone know you're thinking about them. And if you want to wish someone happy birthday but need it to arrive today, you can now buy eCards through the app which are delivered instantly by email.

And if you want to wish someone happy birthday but need it to arrive today, you can now buy eCards through the app which are delivered instantly by email.

And if you want to wish someone happy birthday but need it to arrive today, you can now buy eCards through the app which are delivered instantly by email.

When you place an order we now send notifications to tell you how and when it will arrive to help keep you informed about your order.
We’ve updated the Order History so we don’t tell you your order is printing when you’ve ordered chocolates - anyone who’s ordered an ice cream from a certain pizza restaurant will know this bug.
We now let you know when setting a reminder if you don’t have notifications enabled just to make sure you don’t miss out on those crucial reminders. Not that you would forget without them.
Fresh fixes to make your Moonpig app experience brilliant!
